item.description:
Anyone can choose to march in Hartford's crazy parade celebrating the founder, Thomas Hooker! Craziness is encouraged! Any manner of marcher, costume, self-propelled float, musical instrument, boom box, roller skate, roller blade or skateboard is encouraged. You are encouraged to throw candy, beads, cups, Frisbees, t-shirts, Nerf products or Hula Hoops. Feel free to hand out postcards or brochures for your group or organization along the way.

You must register for free by calling today (more details posted here):

http://hookerdayparade.eventbrite.com/?ref=ebtn

There's an after-party 3pm-7pm with music, dancing, & giveaways at PourHouse.

See past entrants here: http://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.477331440971.277141.67906320971

$500 prize for the best group entry and $100 prize for the best solo entry.

HOST: Jason, cell # in RSVP (texting is fine too)

PARKING: Free, for registered march-ers.
item.how_to_find_us: Text or call Jason, my # is in my RSVP
item.name: Sat 10/22 - March in Hartford's crazy Hooker Day parade & afterparty,win a prize
